meanings.sent1: The story was so unimaginative, it felt like I had heard it a hundred times before.
meanings.sent2: Her unimaginative painting failed to capture the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The unimaginative birthday gift of socks drew a few chuckles from the party guests.
meanings.sent4: His unimaginative approach to problem-solving was like trying to fix a leaky boat with a sieve.
meanings.sent5: The unimaginative design of the building made it blend in with all the others on the street.

meanings.definition: Not able to think of new ideas or solutions.
meanings.sent1: The unimaginative student struggled to come up with a unique project for the science fair.
meanings.sent2: His unimaginative response to the challenge showed a lack of innovation.
meanings.sent3: The unimaginative chef kept serving the same boring dish every night.
meanings.sent4: Her unimaginative mind was like a closed door, unable to let new ideas in.
meanings.sent5: The unimaginative approach to marketing left the company falling behind its competitors.
